questions.question: The Sahara Desert is the largest desert in the world
Mount Kilimanjaro, the highest peak in Africa, is located in Kenya.
The Nile River is the longest river in the world.
Africa is the most linguistically diverse continent in the world.
The African continent is home to the largest population of elephants in the world.
The majority of Africa lies in the Northern Hemisphere
Swahili is the official language of Nigeria.
Africa has only one time zone.
The Great Rift Valley, a geological feature, runs through East Africa.
Madagascar is the largest island in Africa.
